long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Offers a moment for pausing and reflecting in the liminal space between web pages.

If you've spent enough time on the current page, before redirecting to a new link, your browser will ask you what you learned about the current page. Edit the minimum seconds for this feature through the extension widget. A timer in the top-right hand corner of the screen tells you how long you've spent on the current page.
